head.title: The Quest to Lift The Impossible Lid

hedline.hl1: The Quest to Lift The Impossible Lid

abstract.p: Jar Pop, plastic gadget from Denmark, makes it easy to break a jar's vacuum seal; photo (S).

block.p: Stubborn jar lids have inspired many tricks to get them off, like slamming the jar upside down on a hard surface or wrapping the lid with rubber bands or plastic wrap for a better grip. Jar Pop, a plastic gadget from Denmark, makes these unnecessary. This tool, which looks like a bottle opener, tackles the hard part, breaking the jar's vacuum seal. After that, any jar can be unscrewed easily. Gristede's supermarkets sells them for $1.99.
